page.title: 12 Playground Games
page.content: During the last week of the summer term, we made a survey of playground games. The most popular games are catching and chasing others, next ball games, then skipping, then 'imagination' games 'goodies and baddies' of different kinds. Some games are for a few children, others for a large number. Many games have one child 'on', who catches others, who then either chase with him, or her, or have to be released by the rest - Had, Stuck in the mud. In some ball games (Wall Ball, Space Invaders, Had Ball) the person on has to hit the others with a ball while they run, sometimes within a named area. The first person hit is the next on. Some combine chasing with 'hide and seek'-Ting-Tang-Tommy. Football, Cricket and rounders are also popular .
